seo.title: Karty SIM/eSIM i bankomaty w Positano
seo.description: Gdzie kupić SIM lub eSIM, jak działa zasięg i na co uważać przy wypłatach z bankomatów.

linkLabel: Karty SIM/eSIM i bankomaty w Positano
intro: Stay online and cash-ready by setting up your SIM plan before arriving and planning ATM stops with lower fees.

sections.title: ATM strategy
body: Withdraw €100–€150 per time and split notes between your day bag and a secure pocket in your luggage.

a: Yes, but expect slower speeds offshore; download playlists and maps before boarding ferries.

faqs.q: Are ATMs reliable late at night?
